channel.title: Client.java prayer help
channel.description:
Everytime i try to bury a bone on my server it gets an error and kicks me.
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 50 at client.addSkillXP(client.java:1439) at client.prayerMessage(client.java:17602) at client.buryItem(client.java:3473) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:11571) at client.process(client.java:18354) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:283) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Devolution [fatal] - exception [client-3-Mod ian]: Logout ClientHandler: Client Mod ian disconnected
Any ideas on how to fix? i could upload the client.java for you to look at if you'd like. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 06:16:01 pm[/size][hr]bump. Please help guys, im rly stuck. Its richscape v2 base btw.
